name: hubot-cf-convenience
description: Some added functionality on top of cf-nodejs-client.  Planned to be contributed at a later date.

scripts.coverage: . test/.env && istanbul cover -x '**/coverage/**' -x '**/tools/**' --include-all-sources --report lcov --report cobertura --report text --dir ./gh-pages/coverage _mocha -- test
scripts.postpublish: git push origin master && git push --tags

author: ibm-cloud-solutions
